body: @marianobilli I'm happy to see people using the spark flavor :) I  assumed a low usage and excluded it from the update to save some time. I will try to find some time to provide an update for the spark image as well.

Honestly the spark flavor is a bit heavy, it would be good if it is based on the minimal-flavor and not on top of the r-flavor.

But we are using it a lot, by replacing the spark client with the custom aws spark client and connecting it to AWS EMR clusters.
I don't know @marianobilli  I would still like to have it on top of R. I am using the current 0.12 versio because of it :)
Sure no problem, we are using it anyway, so @LukasMasuch do you think you could build the image? thanks!
I would still be happy if this build can happen :)
I would like to try out the new Spark 3.2 on our ml-hub
This issue is stale because it has been open 90 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment or this will be closed in 14 days

issue.title: Add R and Spark flavors to ml-workspace

repository.name: charts
repository.description: Community App Catalog for TrueNAS SCALE

issue.body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

The R and Spark workspace flavors aren't available in the app configuration.

### Describe the solution you'd like

Add mltooling/ml-workspace-r and mltooling/ml-workspace-spark as a dropdown option in the Container Image selection step.

### Describe alternatives you've considered

Unknown

### Additional context

_No response_

### I've read and agree with the following

- [X] I've checked all open and closed issues and my request is not there.
- [X] I've checked all open and closed pull requests and my request is not there.
